Japan’s Well Being

Bryson Pau

2024-05-01

Load in packages

Read in data

sdr_data <- read.csv(here("data/SDR-2023-Data.csv"))

Clean up the data

sdr_data <- sdr_data %>%
  clean_names()

Focus on a specific region and country

OECD_sdr_data <- sdr_data %>%
  filter(regions_used_for_the_sdr == "OECD")
Japan_sdr_data <- sdr_data %>% 
  filter(country == "Japan")

Now let’s take a look at the overall SDG 12 Score for Japan compared to other countries

bar_Japan <- ggplot(OECD_sdr_data, aes(x= goal_12_score, y = country)) +
  geom_bar(stat = "identity") 
  
ggplotly(bar_Japan)
